messages.question: S15 sensor specification
messages.answer:
The S15S Temperature and Humidity Sensor has the following specifications:

### Features
- Provides temperature and humidity measurements in various environments.
- Connects via RS485 Modbus® registers.
- Rugged overmolded design for durability.
- Ships with an aluminum grill filter cap.
- Optional stainless steel 10 μm sintered filter available separately.

### Models
| Model Number | Function                                          | Control                | Connector                                                  |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| S15S-TH-MQ   | Female connector: Temperature and humidity sensor | Male connector: Modbus | Integral 4-pin M12 male/female quick-disconnect connectors |

### Configuration Instructions
- Utilizes SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software for setup and configuration.

### Sensor Addresses and I/O Range
| Sensor Address | Description | I/O Range                    | Comments | Default | Access |
| -------------- | ----------- | ---------------------------- | -------- | ------- | ------ |
| 40601          | Baud Rate   | 0 = 9.6k 1 = 19.2k 2 = 38.4k | 0 = None | 1       | RW     |
| 40602          | Parity      | 0 = None 1 = Odd 2 = Even    |          | 0       | RW     |

### Measurement Data
| Sensor Address | Description      | I/O Range                    | Holding Register Registration |
| -------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| 40001          | Humidity (%RH)   | Min Value: 0 Max Value: 100% | Min (Dec): 0 Max (Dec): 10000 |
| 40002          | Temperature (°C) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40003          | Temperature (°F) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40004          | Dew Point (°C)   |                              |                               |
| 40005          | Dew Point (°F)   |                              |                               |

### Calculation Formulas
- Temperature = (Modbus register value) ÷ 20
- Humidity = (Holding register value) ÷ 100
- Dew Point = (Holding register value) ÷ 100

### Environmental Specifications
- Validity of Class F 0.3 (B): -50 °C to +150 °C for continuous operation.
- Short term temperature exposure for soldering: Max. 5 minutes up to 250 °C.

### Dimensions and Tolerances (in mm)
| Dimension | Tolerance       |
| --------- | --------------- |
| L         | 2.1 -0.2/+0.2   |
| W1        | 1.9 +0.2        |
| H         | 0.8 -0.2/+0.25  |
| LL        | 7±1             |
| Lø        | 0.22 ±0.02      |
| W2        | 0.7 ±0.1        |

### Response Time
- Air (v = 3 m/s): t0.5 = 1.5 s, t0.9 = 5 s.

### Measuring Current
- Pt100 Ω: 0.3 to 1 mA
- Pt1000 Ω: 0.1 to 0.3 mA (self-heating must be considered).

### Software
- SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software is available for configuration and demonstration of Banner Modbus devices. It is free to download and compatible with Microsoft® Windows® 7 and 10.

For more information, you can visit the Banner Engineering website.
messages.context:
Excerpt 1: S15S Temperature and Humidity Sensor

# Features

The Temperature and Temperature/Humidity Sensor works in a variety of environments to provide temperature and humidity measurements.

- Connects via RS485 Modbus® registers
- Rugged overmolded design
- Ships with aluminum grill filter cap
- Optional stainless steel 10 μm sintered filter available separately

# Models

| Model Number | Function                                          | Control                | Connector                                                  |
| ------------ | ------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------- |
| S15S-TH-MQ   | Female connector: Temperature and humidity sensor | Male connector: Modbus | Integral 4-pin M12 male/female quick-disconnect connectors |

# Configuration Instructions

# SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software

| 40602          | Parity      | 0 = None 1 = Odd 2 = Even    |          | 0       | RW     |

| -------------- | ---------------- | ---------------------------- | ----------------------------- |
| 40001          | Humidity (%RH)   | Min Value: 0 Max Value: 100% | Min (Dec): 0 Max (Dec): 10000 |
| 40002          | Temperature (°C) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40003          | Temperature (°F) | -1638.4 to 1638.3            | -32768 to 32767               |
| 40004          | Dew Point (°C)   |                              |                               |
| 40005          | Dew Point (°F)   |                              |                               |

The temperature = (Modbus register value) ÷ 20. The humidity = (Holding register value) ÷ 100. The dew point = (Holding register value) ÷ 100.

# COMs Settings

Excerpt 4: Validity of Class F 0.3 (B) -50 °C to +150 °C

The specified tolerance classes refer to continuous operation.

Short term temperature exposure for soldering: Max. 5 minutes up to 250 °C.

# Dimensions and Tolerances in mm

| L:  | 2.1 -0.2/+0.2  |
| --- | -------------- |
| W1: | 1.9 +0.2       |
| H:  | 0.8 -0.2/+0.25 |
| LL: | 7±1            |
| Lø: | 0.22 ±0.02     |
| W2: | 0.7 ±0.1       |

# Response Time

Air (v = 3 m/s): t0.5 = 1.5 s

t0.9 = 5 s

# Measuring Current

Pt100 Ω: 0.3 to 1 mA

Pt1000 Ω: 0.1 to 0.3 mA (self-heating has to be considered)

Excerpt 5: Banner's SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software offers an easy way to configure and demonstrate Banner Modbus devices. Users have full control of device configuration, the ability to visualize device data, and to demonstrate device features. The easy-to-use software provides a variety of tools and works with Banner Modbus devices.

- Allows for the configuration and demo of Banner Modbus devices
- Free to download and available on the Banner website at https://www.bannerengineering.com/sg/en/products/software/snap-signal-configuration-software.html
- Works on Microsoft® Windows® 7 and 10(1)
- BWA-UCT-900 cable required to connect PC-based SNAP SIGNAL Configuration Software to Banner Modbus devices

# S15S Modbus Configuration
